body.description: This beautiful deluxe 4-piece expandable luggage set is manufactured with a patented heavy duty EVA-molded hi-count fabric. This set is perfect for the serious and experienced traveler! Manufactured with the very best heavy duty polyester and PVC backing, this luggage set is designed for the traveler on the go and comes with three expandable uprights and a flight tote bag. It comes packed with features including: an inside retractable handle, EZ-Roll in-line skate wheels, back zippered secured pockets, top and side comfort grip handle, stability bars at the bottom to avoid tilting, and locks & keys. Upright features include: Clear in-line skate wheel system for smooth ride Push-button self-locking internally stored retractable handle system Ergonomic and comfortable padded top and side grip handles Two front full size zipper-secured pockets Three internal organizational pockets for all your traveling needs Each upright's interior is fully lined with a durable and elegantly imprinted lining Elegant silver pewter heavy duty industrial hardware Carry-On Flight Tote Bag features include: Elegantly imprinted full interior lining Detachable and adjustable non-slip shoulder strap Spacious main compartment Maximum strength industrial hardware 19-inch Carry-on Upright: 20 inches high x 12. 5 inches wide x 7. 5 inches expandable to 10 inches deep (with wheels). 6 lbs. 24-inch Upright: 24 inches high x 16 inches wide x 10 inches expandable to 12 inches deep. 8 lbs. 28-inch Upright: 28 inches high x 18 inches wide x 12 inches expandable to 14 inches deep. 9 lbs. Carry-On Flight Tote Bag: 14 inches wide x 11 inches high x 5 inches deep – 1 lb.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Rockland 4 Piece Softside Upright Luggage Set This deluxe 4-piece expandable luggage set is manufactured with a patented heavy duty EVA-molded hi-count fabric. Made with the very best heavy duty polyester and PVC backing, this luggage set is designed for the traveler on the go and comes with three expandable uprights and a flight tote bag. A variety of colors and patterns are available for ever taste! Carry-on upright: 20"x 12.5"x 7.5" (with wheels) 24-inch Upright: 24"x16"x10" 28-inch Upright: 28"x18"x12" Tote: 14"x11"x5"

Features and Design Telescoping Handle The telescoping handle stows away conveniently and allows for easy maneuvering when extended. Expandable The upright expands an extra 2 inches in depth to maximize your packing capacity. Sturdy Inline Wheels Two sturdy inline wheels allow for easy transport of your belongings.

About Rockland Luggage Since its inception in 1998, Rockland by Fox Luggage has been proudly producing quality luggage and bags for the style savvy traveler. Recognized for its graphic and colorful designs, Rockland prides itself on creating products influenced by current trends in design and fashion. Our products turn heads in a crowd and stand out in the baggage carousel, making it easy for quick exits out the airport. Affordable and travel resistant, Rockland bags are an ideal companion for everything from quick trips to the gym to overnight getaways to extended vacations. Our selection includes: luggage sets (4 piece, 3 piece or 2 piece), hard cases, soft cases, carry ons, rolling backpacks, travel duffels, rolling duffels, cosmetic bags, and kids' backpacks. Over the years, a few Rockland products have been featured in film and television. Their colorful designs make them ideal for an eye catching visual element on screen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than expected
reviews.reviewText: For the price I kinda expected one time use quality but this set is okay. I got used cuz it’s something I wasnt super picky about- and mine has a box cutter slice in the pocket but I’m sure that’s a specific incident regarding my particular set. They are light and I trust em to get my stuff where it’s going. They are cute and it makes me feel like a real adult to have my own *set* of luggage. I feel like I felt when I first got curtains🤣 They are decent enough for a minimal traveler like myself to keep around for awhile, but if you are a serious jet setter I’d go up a notch in quality. They aren’t going to take a lickin and keep on tickin that well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love this luggage set!!!! Easy to pack, holds alot. Wheels nicely. Great price! Very happy with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Price for the set
reviews.reviewText: Two are small enough to carry on. The other two for checked baggage. I don't recommend taking both a roller carry on and checked bag though hard to pull everything through the airport and any shuttles. I used all but the largest on my last trip. Next time will skip the roller carry on and put more in my checked bag. I was worried about lost luggage and my computer last time. But it was hard going up and down escalators on Phoenix for the sky train with all that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Quality Is Not Impressive
reviews.reviewText: It is disintegrating. Zippers come off; they tear open with light use. Zipper not closing. Very light weight, not excessively heavy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to see at airport baggage claim. Made great. Loved the whole set. Recommend to anyone traveling

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great amount of luggage for the price! The color is exactly what I wanted a nice bright pink. I like that they all fit into the large one but which there was an option for a 32” large piece. That said, i Have purchased Rocklan sets before and they have lasted for many years so hoping these do the same.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These suitcases are REALLY cheap! Cheap material; cheap wheels. And perhaps the worst part is that they only stand up when they are empty. You can not let go of any size without the suitcase falling over. This means it has a poor design.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars You get what you paid for
reviews.reviewText: The set is pretty cute, I like that it's lightweight and pretty durable. I like that it's inexpensive and I have different size options for when I travel. What I don't like is when it's packed it doesn't stay upright on it's own. It's constantly falling over and it has gotten so dirty because of this issue but at least the fabric didn't tear. I also would have preferred it wheels that swivel in all directions but that's my fault for not reading the description properly. The inside material does feel cheap compared to my last suitcase. Overall, would I recommend this to a friend? No. Is it nice for the cost? Yeah. Take what you will with this review.
la relación calidad y precio es muy buena, perfecto para viajar
Vienen muy bien y de buena calidad aunque no traen base lo que hicimos nosotros fue meterle algo aparte igual valen la pena
